simlib.geometry.cartesian_to_polar¶

simlib.geometry.cartesian_to_polar(a)[source]¶

Convert Cartesian to polar coordinates.

Parameters

a (ArrayLike) – Cartesian coordinates.

Returns

Polar coordinates in same shape as a

Return type

numpy.ndarray
